0x00000038.description: MDIO Data to write and last Data read
0x00000038.name: EthMdioData

0x0000003c.description: MDIO Register Address. Address of register within the PHY device to read from or write to. After writing this register, an address-write transaction will be initiated to set the PHY internal address register to the value given.
0x0000003c.name: EthMdioRegAddr

0x00000054.description: Class 0 and 1 pause quanta. When link pause mode is enabled, PauseQuantaCL0 is used.
0x00000054.name: EthPauseQuantaCL01

0x00000064.description: Class 0 and 1 refresh threshold. When link pause mode is enabled, QuantaThreshCL0 is used for refreshing pause frames.
0x00000064.name: EthQuantaThreshCL01

0x00000074.description: Current per class received pause status. 0 is used for link pause also.
0x00000074.name: EthRxPauseStatus

0x000000e4.description: Lower 32bit of 64bit value written into statistics memory when a counter is cleared (testing only, should be 0 normally)
0x000000e4.name: EthStatnClearvalueLo

0x000000e8.description: Upper 32bit of 64bit value written into statistics memory when a counter is cleared (testing only, should be 0 normally)
0x000000e8.name: EthStatnClearvalueHi

0x00000128.description: wrong CRC and good length received
0x00000128.name: EthCRCErrors

0x00000130.description: Good Frames with VLAN tag received
0x00000130.name: EthVlanOk

0x000001a0.description: Frames of 1519 to FrmLength octets received
0x000001a0.name: EthEtherStatsPkts1519toMax

0x000001a8.description: Frames greater FrmLength and good CRC received
0x000001a8.name: EthEtherStatsPktsOversize

0x000001b0.description: Frames greater FrmLength and bad CRC received
0x000001b0.name: EthEtherStatsJabbers

0x000001b8.description: Frames less 64 and bad CRC received
0x000001b8.name: EthEtherStatsFragments

0x000001c0.description: Good frames received of type 0x8808 but not Pause
0x000001c0.name: EthAMACControlFrames

0x000001c8.description: Good and bad frames exceeding FrmLength received
0x000001c8.name: EthAFrameTooLong

0x000001d0.description: Good frames with invalid length field (not supported)
0x000001d0.name: EthAInRangeLengthError

0x00000230.description: Good Frames with VLAN tag transmitted
0x00000230.name: EthTxVlanOk

0x000002a0.description: Frames of 1519 to FrmLength.TxMtu octets transmitted
0x000002a0.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts1519toTXMTU

0x000002c0.description: Good frames transmitted of type 0x8808 but not Pause
0x000002c0.name: EthTxAMACControlFrames

fields.description: Wrong SFD detected
fields.name: EthAAlignmentErrors

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived0

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived1

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived2

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived3

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived4

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived5

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived6

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames received for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesReceived7

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted0

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted1

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted2

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted3

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted4

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted5

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted6

fields.description: Set of 8 objects recording the number of CBFC (Class Based Flow Control) pause frames transmitted for each class.
fields.name: EthACBFCPAUSEFramesTransmitted7

fields.description: Good and bad frames exceeding FrmLength received
fields.name: EthAFrameTooLong

fields.description: Good frames with invalid length field (not supported)
fields.name: EthAInRangeLengthError

fields.description: Good frames received of type 0x8808 but not Pause
fields.name: EthAMACControlFrames

fields.description: Good Pause frames received
fields.name: EthAPauseMacCtrlFrames

fields.description: wrong CRC and good length (64..MTU) received
fields.name: EthCRCErrors

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv31

fields.description: reserved; write 0 always
fields.name: EthShortPreamble

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv29

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv28

fields.description: Disable RS fault handling. When set to '0' (default), the MAC automatically inserts remote faults and idles in egress direction on detection of local faults and remote faults, respectively, on ingress direction. When set to '1', this feature is disabled.
fields.name: EthDisableFltHdl

fields.description: Self-Clearing TX FIFO reset command. May not be supported in all Core variants
fields.name: EthTxFifoReset

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv25

fields.description: Mask toplevel pin reg_lowp with RX FIFO empty.
fields.name: EthRegLowpRxempty

fields.description: Instruct RS Layer to transmit LPI.
fields.name: EthTxLowpEna

fields.description: Egress flush enable.
fields.name: EthTxFlush

fields.description: Disable check for SFD (0xd5) and accept frame with any character.
fields.name: EthRxSfdAny

fields.description: Link Pause compatible with PFC mode. Pause is only indicated but does not stop TX.
fields.name: EthPausePfcComp

fields.description: Priority Flow Control Mode enable. If set to 1, the Core generates and processes PFC control frames according to the Priority Flow Control Interface signals. If set to 0 (Reset Value), the Core operates in legacy Pause Frame mode and generates and processes standard Pause Frames.
fields.name: EthPfcMode

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthRsColCntExt

fields.description: Disable Payload Length Check. Not supported; write 0 always.
fields.name: EthNoLgthCheck

fields.description: Force Idle Generation. If set to '1', the MAC permanently sends XLGMII Idle sequences even when faults are received.
fields.name: EthSendIdle

fields.description: Controls toplevel pin phy_txena. No internal function
fields.name: EthPhyTxena

fields.description: Enable Receive Errored Frame Discard. Use only with RX FIFO Store and Forward. May not be supported by all Core variants.
fields.name: EthRxErrDiscard

fields.description: Enable Reception of all Control Frames. If set to '1', all control frames are accepted. If set to '0', only Pause frames are accepted and all other command frames are rejected.
fields.name: EthCmdFrameEna

fields.description: Self-Clearing Software Reset. When written with '1', all Statistics Counters are reset to 0.
fields.name: EthSwReset

fields.description: reserved, 0 always. The MAC never appends padding octets; the user application must provide frames of correct minimum size.
fields.name: EthTxPadEn

fields.description: Enable PHY Interface loopback. If set to '1', the signal loop_ena is set to '1'. If set to '0' (Reset value), the signal loop_ena is set to '0'.
fields.name: EthLoopBackEn

fields.description: Set Source MAC Address on Transmit. If set to '1', the MAC overwrites the source MAC address received from the client interface with the MAC address programmed in registers MacAddr0 and MacAddr1 . If set to '0' (Reset value), the source MAC address from the client interface is transmitted unmodified to the line.
fields.name: EthTxAddrIns

fields.description: Ignore received Pause frame quanta. If set to '1', received pause frames are ignored by the MAC. If set to '0' (Reset value), the transmit process is stopped for the amount of time specified in the pause quanta received within a pause frame.
fields.name: EthPauseIgnore

fields.description: Terminate / Forward Pause Frames. If set to '1', pause frames are forwarded to the user application. If set to '0' (Reset value), pause frames are terminated and discarded within the MAC.
fields.name: EthPauseFwd

fields.description: Terminate / Forward Received CRC. If set to '1', the CRC field of received frames is forwarded with the frame to the user application. If set to '0' (Reset value), the CRC field is stripped from the frame. Note - If padding (Bit PadEn set to ?1?) is enabled, CrcFwd is ignored.
fields.name: EthCrcFwd

fields.description: reserved, write 0 always. (MAC never removes padding)
fields.name: EthPadEn

fields.description: Enable MAC Promiscuous Operation. If set to '1', all frames are received without any MAC address filtering. If set to '0' (Reset value), Unicast frames with a destination address not matching the Core MAC address (programmed in registers MacAddr0 and MacAddr1) are rejected.
fields.name: EthPromisEn

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv3

fields.description: reserved
fields.name: EthMacccRsv2

fields.description: MAC Receive Path Enable. Should be set to '1' to enable the MAC receive path, should be set to '0' (Reset value) to disable the MAC receive path.
fields.name: EthRxEna

fields.description: MAC Transmit Path Enable. Should be set to '1' to enable the MAC transmit path, should be set to '0' (Reset value) to disable the MAC transmit path.
fields.name: EthTxEna

fields.description: Current credit register value (for debug purpose only).
fields.name: EthCredits

fields.description: Credit-based FIFO only: When written with a 1, RX FIFO reset occurs and credit counter loaded from the InitCredit value.
fields.name: EthLoadCredit

fields.description: Dropped frames
fields.name: EthEtherStatsDropEvents

fields.description: Frames less 64 and bad CRC received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsFragments

fields.description: Frames greater FrmLength and bad CRC received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsJabbers

fields.description: Total Octets received; good and bad
fields.name: EthEtherStatsOctets

fields.description: Frames received, good and bad
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts

fields.description: Frames of 1024 to 1518 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts1024to1518

fields.description: Frames of 128 to 255 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts128to255

fields.description: Frames of 1519 to FrmLength octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts1519toMax

fields.description: Frames of 256 to 511 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts256to511

fields.description: Frames of 512 to 1023 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts512to1023

fields.description: Frames of 64 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts64

fields.description: Frames of 65 to 127 octets received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPkts65to127

fields.description: Frames greater FrmLength and good CRC received
fields.name: EthEtherStatsPktsOversize

fields.description: Good frames received
fields.name: EthFramesOK

fields.description: Optional maximum frame size setting for transmit statistics use if it should be different from receive statistics. When set to 0 the FrmLength value is used (i.e. statistics symmetric for TX and RX).
fields.name: EthTxMtu

fields.description: Maximum Frame Size
fields.name: EthFrmLength

fields.description: enables (1) or disables (0) multicast frame reception for the entry.
fields.name: EthEnableMulticastFrame

fields.description: 0 specify the hash table address (code)
fields.name: EthHashTableAddress

fields.description: Good Broadcast received
fields.name: EthIfInBcastPkts

fields.description: Errored frames received
fields.name: EthIfInErrors

fields.description: Good Multicast received
fields.name: EthIfInMcastPkts

fields.description: Good Unicast received
fields.name: EthIfInUcastPkts

fields.description: Good Broadcast transmitted
fields.name: EthIfOutBcastPkts

fields.description: Errored frames transmitted
fields.name: EthIfOutErrors

fields.description: Good Multicast transmitted
fields.name: EthIfOutMcastPkts

fields.description: Good Unicast transmitted
fields.name: EthIfOutUcastPkts

fields.description: Credit-based FIFO only: Specifies the initial credit value to be loaded.
fields.name: EthInitialCredit

fields.description: First 4 bytes of the MAC Address. First byte is 7:0.
fields.name: EthMacAddr0

fields.description: Last 2 bytes: 5th is 7:0, 6th is 15:8
fields.name: EthMacAddr1

fields.description: MDIO clock divisor; A value of 5 to 511. The frequency is reg_clk/(2*divisor+1). The reset default is defined by the synthesis package setting MDIO_CLK_DIV. Setting the divisor to 0 disables MDC.
fields.name: EthMdioClkDivisor

fields.description: MDIO transaction use Clause 45 format (1) or Clause 22 format (0).
fields.name: EthMdioClause45

fields.description: MDIO transaction preamble disable. Shortens transaction but is non-standard.
fields.name: EthMdioDisablePreamble

fields.description: MDIO hold time setting (reg_clk cycles).
fields.name: EthMdioHoldTime

fields.description: MDIO read error. If set, the last read transaction had no response from a PHY and the data read could be invalid. This can happen, if the PHY address does not match any PHY that is available on the MDIO bus.
fields.name: EthMdioRdError

fields.description: MDIO busy. If set, a MDIO transaction is currently ongoing. If cleared, the application can access the other registers.
fields.name: EthMdioBusy

fields.description: If written with 1, a normal read transaction is initiated.
fields.name: EthMdioRdCmd

fields.description: If written with 1, a read with address post-increment will be performed. Post-increment will be performed in the PHY internal address register.
fields.name: EthMdioRdCmdCl45

fields.description: Port Address
fields.name: EthMdioPortPhyAddr

fields.description: Device Address
fields.name: EthMdioDevRegAddr

fields.description: 16-bit data word. When written- Initiates a write transaction to the PHY. The MdioCommand register must have been initialized. The busy status bit will be set immediately and cleared when the write transaction has finished. When read - Returns the data read from the PHY register after a read transaction has been completed (initiated by writing a 1 to Bit 15 or Bit 14 of the MdioCommand register).
fields.name: EthMdioData

fields.description: The MdioCommand register must have been initialized before the first write to this register.
fields.name: EthMdioRegAddr

fields.description: Total Octets received; good
fields.name: EthOctetsOK

fields.description: Value to be sent for the PFC quanta value for that class when a class XOFF is triggered. Each Quanta specifies a 512 bit-time.
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL1

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL0
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL0

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL3; Value to be sent for the PFC quanta value for that class when a class XOFF is triggered.
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL3

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL2
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL2

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL5; Value to be sent for the PFC quanta value for that class when a class XOFF is triggered.
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL5

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL4
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL4

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL7; Value to be sent for the PFC quanta value for that class when a class XOFF is triggered.
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL7

fields.description: PauseQuantaCL6
fields.name: EthPauseQuantaCL6

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL1;When a PFC quanta timer counts down and reaches this value, a refresh pause frame should be sent with the programmed full quanta value if the input level indicates that a pause condition still exists.
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL1

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL0
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL0

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL3; When a PFC quanta timer counts down and reaches this value, a refresh pause frame should be sent with the programmed full quanta value if the input level indicates that a pause condition still exists.
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL3

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL2
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL2

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL5
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL5

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL4
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL4

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL7
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL7

fields.description: QuantaThreshCL6
fields.name: EthQuantaThreshCL6

fields.description: Programmable Customer Revision from package parameter CUST_REVISION
fields.name: EthCustRev

fields.description: 8-bit value from package parameter CORE_VERSION
fields.name: EthCoreVer

fields.description: 8-bit value from package parameter CORE_REVISION
fields.name: EthCoreRev

fields.description: RX FIFO almost full threshold
fields.name: EthRxFifoAlmostFull

fields.description: RX FIFO almost empty threshold
fields.name: EthRxFifoAlmostEmpty

fields.description: RX section empty threshold
fields.name: EthRxSectionEmptyWm

fields.description: RX section avail. threshold
fields.name: EthRxSectionAvailWm

fields.description: Status bit for software to read the current received pause status. One bit for each of the 8 classes.
fields.name: EthPauseStatus

fields.description: The Scratch Register provides a memory location to test the register access
fields.name: EthScratch

fields.description: Clear all counters command (self-clearing). When written with 1 all counters (tx and rx) are cleared (set to STATN_CLEARVALUE).
fields.name: EthClear

fields.description: Configure clear-on-read behavior. When set to 1, the counters are cleared (set to STATN_CLEARVALUE) after having been transferred into the read registers (snapshot captured). When set 0 (default) the counters are not modified when read/captured.
fields.name: EthClearOnRead

fields.description: Configure saturation behavior. When set to 1, the counters saturate at all-1. Otherwise counters wrap around.
fields.name: EthSaturate

fields.description: Upper 32bit of 64bit value used for clearing a memory entry. Value resets to 0 when command_config.sw_reset is issued.
fields.name: EthValueHi

fields.description: Lower 32bit of 64bit value used for clearing a memory entry. Value resets to 0 when command_config.sw_reset is issued.
fields.name: EthValueLo

fields.description: TX MAC datapath (statemachine) is idle
fields.name: EthTxIsIdle

fields.description: Special Link Interruption Fault Sequence detected in receive
fields.name: EthRxLintFault

fields.description: RX FIFO is empty
fields.name: EthRxEmpty

fields.description: TX FIFO is empty
fields.name: EthTxEmpty

fields.description: Receiving Low Power Idle (LPI)
fields.name: EthRxLowp

fields.description: Transmit Timestamp Available. Indicates that the timestamp of the last transmitted 1588 event frame is available in the register Timestamp.  To clear TsAvail, the bit must be written with a '1'.
fields.name: EthTsAvail

fields.description: PHY indicates loss-of-signal. Represents value of pin "phy_los".
fields.name: EthPhyLos

fields.description: Remote Fault Status. Set to '1' when the MAC detects Rx Remote Fault Sequences on the CGMII receive interface
fields.name: EthRxRemFault

fields.description: Local Fault Status. Set to '1' when the MAC detects Rx Local Fault Sequences on the CGMII receive interface.
fields.name: EthRxLocFault

fields.description: Timestamp of the last frame transmitted by the Core that had the ff_tx_ts_frm signal asserted from the user application. Valid when the status bit TsAvail is set to '1'.
fields.name: EthTimestamp

fields.description: Good frames transmitted of type 0x8808 but not Pause
fields.name: EthTxAMACControlFrames

fields.description: Good Pause frames transmitted
fields.name: EthTxAPauseMacCtrlFrames

fields.description: wrong CRC transmitted
fields.name: EthTxCRCErrors

fields.description: Dropped frames (unused, reserved)
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsDropEvents

fields.description: Total Octets transmitted; good and bad
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsOctets

fields.description: Frames transmitted, good and bad
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts

fields.description: Frames of 1024 to 1518 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts1024to1518

fields.description: Frames of 128 to 255 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts128to255

fields.description: Frames of 1519 to FrmLength octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts1519toMax

fields.description: Frames of 256 to 511 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts256to511

fields.description: Frames of 512 to 1023 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts512to1023

fields.description: Frames of 64 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts64

fields.description: Frames of 65 to 127 octets transmitted
fields.name: EthTxEtherStatsPkts65to127

fields.description: TX FIFO almost full threshold
fields.name: EthTxFifoAlmostFull

fields.description: TX FIFO almost empty threshold
fields.name: EthTxFifoAlmostEmpty

fields.description: TX section empty threshold
fields.name: EthTxSectionEmpty

fields.description: TX section avail. threshold
fields.name: EthTxSectionAvail

fields.description: Good frames transmitted
fields.name: EthTxFramesOK

fields.description: Compensation for PCS inserted markers. Depending on PCS type a value of 16383 (40G) or 20479 (25/50G) must be set.
fields.name: EthCompensation

fields.description: Number of octets in steps of 4 (XGMII) or 8 (XLGMII). Minimum 8. Value 12 should be set for compliant operation.
fields.name: EthTxIpgLength

fields.description: Total Octets transmitted; good
fields.name: EthTxOctetsOK

fields.description: Good Frames with VLAN tag transmitted
fields.name: EthTxVlanOk

fields.description: Good Frames with VLAN tag received
fields.name: EthVlanOk

fields.description: Enable 1-step capable datapath (if available)
fields.name: EthOnestepena

fields.description: Enable Pause Timer Compensation when using external XLGMII/GMII Converter
fields.name: EthPauseTimerx8

fields.description: Enable XGMII-64 (4byte alignment)
fields.name: EthXgmii
